<h1 align="center">
  WordPress Lightweight Starter Theme
</h1>

## 🚀 Quick start

1.  **Install WordPress**

    Full documentation for WP install procedure [on the website](https://wordpress.org/support/article/how-to-install-wordpress/).

2.  **Move theme**

    Move theme to WordPress theme folder

    ```shell
    cd your_wp_folder/wp-content/themes
    ```

3.  **Activate theme**

    Go to your website address where is WP installed: *your-domain/wp-admin*.

    Login in and active theme at: *your-domain/wp-admin/themes.php*.

    Now you can see your actual theme version at *your-domain*.
    
4. **Start developing**

## 🎓 More about WordPress

Full documentation for developing WordPress themes [on the website](https://developer.wordpress.org/).
